results.title: Metformin intervention against ovarian toxicity during chemotherapy for early breast cancer: Study protocol for a randomized double-blind placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Female @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with early @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ (N = 314) will be randomly assigned to two groups (placebo, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 2000 mg). @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ will be administered during and after chemotherapy for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Mucopolysaccharidosis_III</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009084 @@@stage I-IIIa@@@ @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang J, Ma X, Li Y, Liu R, Li Y, Zhang P, Ren W, Cui P, Wang B, Zhang M, Jin Y, Li X, Wang S. Metformin intervention against ovarian toxicity during chemotherapy for early breast cancer: Study protocol for a randomized double-blind placebo-controlled trial. Maturitas. 2020 Jul;137():1-6. PMID: 32498930
